message.raw:
Updated fit_gaussian_2d.py to use rebinning.
Added control for this in Compute_Fit.vi. Added Thomas-Fermi function to fitting
script in anticipation of using this in BIAS. fit_gaussian_2d.py is now near
identical to the version in analyislib.common. Also renamed uncertainty pars to
conform to the regular 'u_' + par_name convention.
